TopicTitle: ESA ARV Manned resupply ship (ATV lookalike, comes with Ariane 5)

Articles.Content:
After much work, here is the ARV, a Manned Rendez-vous vehicle:

It has 4 panels, 8 engines and enough monopropellant to reach stations in LKO and MKO.

It is launched atop an Ariane-5:

It has a fairing and a LES.

How it works:

Some pics:

How to use:

1. Launch

2. When the second stage is working, press 0 to jettison fairing

3. No debris must be taken, so the ARV will have to circularize with its own engines, expending about 45% of its fuel.

4. Deploy panels, do orbital operation.

De-orbit:

Use engines to de-orbit, before re-entry disconnect service module by selecting the Docking port Sr. and decoupling

or press Backspace. Then use RCS which you will still have on the instrument module to get away from the service module.

Prior to re-entry decouple the docking port with RCS tank.

Action groups

1-Toggle panels

0-Jettison fairing/undock/decouple from stuff attached to front docking port

Backspace/abort-Abort sequence(when tower still in place)

When no tower, just disconnects service module.
